scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a pastoral landscape with several figures and animals. In the foreground, a woman sits with a lamb in her lap, while a man in a cap gestures upwards. Behind them, a shepherd with a staff tends to a flock of sheep and a dog. In the background, a town with buildings and towers is visible. Above, two winged figures hold a banner inscribed with "GLORIA IN EXCELSIS DEO IN TERRA PAX". The overall scene evokes a peaceful rural setting with a divine message.
